entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CookieOptions - Domain property not leading to expected behavior #43579
  • asp.net core identity two factor remember me cookie being overwritten #43577
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix #43574
  • [Feature Request]: Make LinkGenerator support complex objects #43572
  • Browser Link Errors after Disconnect #43571
  • using the blazorwebview control to load a local and external plugin of blazor webassembly program in the Maui blazor program does not work #43565
  • Blazor Webassembly Authentication with OpenIDConnect endsession missing id_token_hint #43563
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity UserManager - Delete user AuthenticatorKey and RecoveryCodes #43562

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly App with user accounts won't run in IIS #43399
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box for Results.Problem() #36417
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is it possible to log to a text file with ASP Core .Net 6? #43564
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, json #43350
  • Perf improvement: json #43425
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43549
  • Allow endpoint filter attribute #43421
  • Hot reload no longer works in dotnet CLI #43540
  • CORS policy per request #43526
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] cmake build for MSYS/Mingw64 on windows failed #43560
  • `launchUrl` and `launchBrowser` settings not respected #43531
  • Blazor custom events incorrect currentTarget #42344
    Discussions
  • Hot reload not work for combination of static render and wasm #42439
    Discussions
  • Errors when add "Razor Class Library" reference to .NET6 Blazor Webassembly #43377
  • ASP.NET Core 7.0 SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider is inconsistent #43524

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43578
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43576
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • docs: Remove syntax error in xml docs for `AuthenticationBuilder` #43575
    area-security, community-contribution
  • fix #43523 Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43558
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Improve port search retry logic #43557
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43573
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43534
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-alpha1
  • Make skipComponentGovernanceDetection a variable #43477
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43518
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 7.0-rc2
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43521
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Workaround Xunit bug casting InlineData #43570
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43566
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Quarantine OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43561
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Fix linking issues #43515
    area-blazor, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43533
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Updated

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1969939 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Cover release/7.0 in our pipelines #43483
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Skip output caching for keys with delimiters #43553
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43545
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
